snippet: Grenada’s Kirani James, a 19-year-old nicknamed the Jaguar, who once starred for the University of Alabama, won the men’s 400 meters in 43.94 seconds.
abstract: Grenada's sprinter Kirani James wins the men's 400 meters at the London Games, giving Grenada it's first Olympic medal in any sport.
lead_paragraph: Grenada’s Kirani James, a 19-year-old nicknamed the Jaguar, who once starred for the University of Alabama, won the men’s 400 meters in 43.94 seconds.

headline.seo: Kirani James Gives Grenada First Olympic Medal, Winning 400 Meters
headline.main: Sprinter Gives Grenada Its First Medal
headline.print_headline: Sprinter Gives Grenada Its First Medal
